channel.title: 508 Webclient Development!
channel.description:
I didn't really see anywhere else to put this, so sorry if its in the wrong section.
Started a webclient, which can be tried here as I improve it.
http://rs2surpluss.ulmb.com/index.html
As for Jagex's copyrights I'm not sure how long it'll work before I need to get a new host sadly.
Features: ~ Selectable IP
More to come, give some suggestions for what could be added.

item.title: 508 Webclient Development!
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

zyle1992:

Basically, you will be shut down for breaking “International Copyright Laws”, aka the DMC, or whatever it’s called.

No,
You get shutdown for couple of reason

  1. For being a dumbass
  2. For hosting a runescape server without moparscape or silab projection. Or a download client
  3. Hosting phishing sites
  4. Copyright
    That’s the reasons.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 10:17:58 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Ultra508, post:1, topic:250493”]I didn’t really see anywhere else to put this, so sorry if its in the wrong section.

Started a webclient, which can be tried here as I improve it.

http://rs2surpluss.ulmb.com/index.html

As for Jagex’s copyrights I’m not sure how long it’ll work before I need to get a new host sadly.

Features:
~ Selectable IP

More to come, give some suggestions for what could be added.[/quote]
if this is (YOURS)
Send me the jar file.
I’ll believe you then.

Read full topic
